section.name: Enterprise Java (605.784.31) Root
section.p: This is the course home page for the Enterprise Java Course (605.784), taught at John's Hopkins University, Engineering Programs for Professionals.

ul.li: 2006-10-24: Posted ejb sesion bean, jndi, and ear materials
2006-09-24: Posted project 1 sample test data and parser in snapshot repository: groupId=ejava.javaee.projects artifactId=mayberryData version=1.0-SNAPSHOT
2006-09-20: Posted Java Persistence API, Entity Manager examples and lecture. Added EntityManager exercise.
2006-09-13: Posted JDBC examples and lecture. Added JDBC Online tutorial exercise.
2006-09-07: Posted updates to exercise 0 that corrected munged URL text, typos, and missing javaee.jar issue
Begin mapping a few business objects to DB with JPA
